1. Page speed and responsiveness 📱

  • Use tools like PageSpeed Insights to check your site's performance on both mobile and desktop. We've got more tips on this, too!
  • A fast, mobile-friendly site boosts engagement metrics like dwell time and click-through rates, enhancing your site's authority with search engines.

2. Headings 🔍

  • When users land on a page, they scan headings to see if the content matches their search. Search engines do the same to understand your page’s topic.
  • Use the correct heading tags to inform search engines and screen readers about the content hierarchy:
    • `<h1>` for page title
    • `<h2>` and `<h3>` sub headings
    • `<h4>`, `<h5>` and `<h6>` further structure within those subsections.

3. Internal linking 🔗

  • Link related content naturally to help users explore topics more deeply or find additional services.
  • Search engines crawl these links, expanding your site's relevance and authority on specific subjects, which improves your search rankings.
